title: volumetric attacks
extract: A volumetric attack sends a high amount of traffic, or request packets, to a targeted network in an effort to overwhelm its bandwidth capabilities. ... As a result, volumetric attacks are much more difficult to mitigate than attacks that originate from a single source.
extract_html: A volumetric attack sends a high amount of traffic, or request packets, to a targeted network in an effort to overwhelm its bandwidth capabilities. ... As a result, volumetric attacks are much more difficult to mitigate than attacks that originate from a single source.
